author: Erwin Smith
quote: If you begin to regret, you'll dull your future decisions and let others make your choices for you. All that's left for you then is to die. Nobody can foretell the outcome. Each decision you make holds meaning only by affecting your next decision.

author: Nami
quote: Life is like a pencil that will surely run out, but will leave the beautiful writing of life.

author: Jeon Jungkook
quote: Effort makes you. You will regret it someday if you don’t do your best now. Don’t think it’s too late but keep working on it. It takes time, but there’s nothing that gets worse due to practicing. So practice. You may get depressed, but it’s evidence that you are doing good.

author: Edward Elric
quote: Stand up and walk. Keep moving forward. You've got two good legs. So get up and use them. You're strong enough to make your own path.

author: Epicurus
quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.

author: Uncle Iroh
quote: It is important to draw wisdom from different places. If you take it from only one place it becomes rigid and stale.
